Question: Keychron Technology (Shenzhen) Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Keychron Technology (Shenzhen) Co., Ltd.

Product: Keychron Q1 HE Keyboard

- Features magnetic, analog Hall effect switches for customizable sensitivity
- Offers rapid trigger feature for instant keypress registration
- Allows customization of analog features via Keychronâ€™s web app
- Can be used wired or wirelessly with Bluetooth or 2.4GHz USB dongle connectivity
- Compact 75-percent layout with aluminum case and gasket-mounted construction
- Equipped with durable double-shot PBT keycaps and PCB-mounted screw-in stabilizers
- Linear Gateron 2.0 Magnetic switches with hot-swappable capability
- Includes volume knob and south-facing RGB backlighting
- Expected to start shipping in February

Note: The product is available for backing on Kickstarter and offers extensive customization, including analog sensitivity and multiple connectivity options.
